name: GooCubelets: OCD
description:
PUZZLES, A WAY OF LIFE?
Imagine the world where puzzles are a way of life. Where all the cubelets serve their purpose. Where every puzzle-lover can find his dream puzzle and challenge himself to all the boundaries.GooCubelets are happy to give you that opportunity!
With 50 completely new and unique puzzles, every puzzle-loving gamer will find satisfaction. So, if you are ready to crack some riddles, smear some ooze and do a lot of cubing around, this game is definitely for you!YOUR SKILLS
Try your skills while hanging out with the ooziest cubes there are. Imagine the world where Ooze Can Dream.
